verses.verse: <S%G3588><s%> For The Rest, <S%G3063><s%> Pray, <S%G4336><s%> Brethern, <S%G80><s%> For <S%G4012><s%> Us, <S%G2257><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> May Run <S%G5143><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> May Be Glorified, <S%G1392><s%> Even As <S%G2531><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> With <S%G4314><s%> You; <S%G5209><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> We May Be Delivered <S%G4506><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Perverse <S%G824><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Wicked <S%G4190><s%> Men, <S%G444><s%> <S%G3756><s%> For Not <S%G1063><s%> Of All Is <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Faith The Portion . <S%G4102><s%>

Faithful <S%G4103><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Will Establish <S%G4741><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Keep You <S%G5442><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Evil. <S%G4190><s%>

<S%G3982><s%> But We Trust <S%G1161><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> ' As To <S%G1909><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> The Things Which <S%G3739><s%> We Charge <S%G3853><s%>, You, <S%G5213><s%> Both <S%G2532><s%> Ye Are Doing <S%G4160><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Do. <S%G4160><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> May Direct <S%G2720><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hearts <S%G2588><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Into The <S%G1519><s%> Endurance <S%G5281><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

<S%G3853><s%> Now We Charge <S%G1161><s%> You, <S%G5213><s%> Brethern, <S%G80><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Of Our Lord <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, That <S%G5547><s%> Withdraw <S%G4724><s%> Ye <S%G5209><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> Disorderly <S%G814><s%> Walking, <S%G4043><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tradition <S%G3862><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> He Received <S%G3880><s%> ' From <S%G3844><s%> Us. <S%G2257><s%>

<S%G846><s%> For Yourselves <S%G1063><s%> Ye Know <S%G1492><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> It Behoves You <S%G1163><s%> To Imitate <S%G3401><s%> Us, <S%G2248><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3756><s%> We Behaved Not Disorderly <S%G812><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> You; <S%G5213><s%>

Nor <S%G3761><s%> For Nought <S%G1432><s%> Bread <S%G740><s%> Did We Eat <S%G5315><s%> From <S%G3844><s%> Anyone; <S%G5100><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Labour <S%G2873><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Toil, <S%G3449><s%> Night <S%G3571><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> Working, <S%G2038><s%> For <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> To Be Burdensome To <S%G1912><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Of You. <S%G5216><s%>

Not <S%G3756><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3756><s%> We Have Not <S%G2192><s%> Authority, <S%G1849><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Ourselves <S%G1438><s%> A Pattern <S%G5179><s%> We Might Give <S%G1325><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Imitate <S%G3401><s%> Us. <S%G2248><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> For Also <S%G1063><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> <S%G1510><s%> With <S%G4314><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> We Charged <S%G3853><s%> You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Does Not Wish <S%G2309><s%> To Work, <S%G2038><s%> Neither <S%G3366><s%> Let Him Eat. <S%G2068><s%>

We Hear <S%G191><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> Are Walking <S%G4043><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> Disorderly, <S%G814><s%> Not At All <S%G3367><s%> Working, <S%G2038><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Being Busy Bodies. <S%G4020><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G1161><s%> Now Such <S%G5108><s%> We Charge <S%G3853><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Exhort <S%G3870><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Our Lord <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, Christ, <S%G5547><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Quietness <S%G2271><s%> Working, <S%G2038><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Their Own <S%G1438><s%> Bread <S%G740><s%> They May Eat. <S%G2068><s%>
<S%G5210><s%> But Ye, <S%G1161><s%> Brethern, <S%G80><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Do Not Lose Heart In <S%G1573><s%> Well Doing. <S%G2569><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Obey Not <S%G5219><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3056><s%> Our Word <S%G2257><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Epistle, <S%G1992><s%> That Man <S%G5126><s%> Mark <S%G4593><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Associate Not With <S%G4874><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> He May Be Ashamed; <S%G1788><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> An Enemy <S%G2190><s%> Esteem Him, <S%G2233><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Admonish Him <S%G3560><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Brother. <S%G80><s%>

<S%G846><s%> But Himself <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Peace <S%G1515><s%> May Give <S%G1325><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> <S%G1223><s%> Continually <S%G3956><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Way. <S%G5158><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord Be <S%G2962><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> You. <S%G5216><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Salutation <S%G783><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1699><s%> By My Own Hand <S%G5495><s%> Of Paul, <S%G3972><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Is The <S%G2076><s%> Sign <S%G4592><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Epistle; <S%G1992><s%> So <S%G3779><s%> I Write. <S%G1125><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Of Our Lord <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Be With <S%G3326><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> You. <S%G5216><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%> To The <S%G4314><s%> Thessalonians <S%G2331><s%> Second <S%G1208><s%> Written <S%G1125><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Athens. <S%G116><s%>
